metadata.name: Embracing of the Flawed Mind
metadata.description:
We live our lives in a manner to reach absolute perfection however in the pursuit of perfection we forget how it can damage us. 
The art of healing and the embracing of our own flaws can set us on a journey of  peace. 
Embracing of our Flawed Mind is an art piece which depicts that even our imperfections can be beautiful. We are beautiful in our own ways and our self acceptance is how we must see ourselves.
